moves.1. b4 e5 2. Bb2 Nc6: Think d7-d6 is actually better because...
moves.3... Nd4 4. e3 Ne6 5. Bxe5 d6 6. Bb2 a6: Perhaps too passive - would have used d2-d4 here
moves.9... Bd7 10. h3 c6 11. e4 cxb5 12. c3: Again I'd have used d3-d4 here instead
moves.12... b4 13. cxb4 axb4 14. Qb3 d5 15. Nb: Clearing the way to castle but also threatening f2
moves.16. Bxf6 Qxf6: Threatens a1 plus hidden attack on f2
moves.17. Rd1 Nd4: Lures away the knight on f3
